description: A compute instance that itself owns a whole network stack and serves as an environment for workloads. Typically it runs an operating system. The exact host type is described in the _type property of the Entity. The UUID of the host should be captured in the _id property of the Entity

ipAddress.description: A listing of all IP addresses associated with this Host

publicIpAddress.description: The public IP address or addresses

privateIpAddress.description: The private IP address or addresses

macAddress.description: A listing of all MAC addresses associated with this Host

osDetails.description: Operating System Full Details (e.g. macOS High Sierra version 10.13.6)

physical.description: Indicates if this is a physical host, such as a physical server.

state.description: The current state of a host (e.g. pending, running, shutting-down, terminated, stopping, stopped)
